* git clone - clone a remote repo (e.g. supply GitHub URL)
* git init - initialise a new repo
* git status - display info about additions/deletions and modifications to the working tree and to the staging area
* git log - display the commit history
* git add - add some files to the staging area
* git commit - commit indexed changes to the repo
* git checkout - switch to a named branch
* git branch - display the list of branches
* git pull - 
* git push
